People with this condition also compulsively lick their fingers and flip pages of books and magazines (a behavior known as ""lick and flip"").  Other signs and symptoms of Smith-Magenis syndrome include short stature, abnormal curvature of the spine (scoliosis), reduced sensitivity to pain and temperature, and a hoarse voice.
